title: Native binary run log is not visible when running tests with Quarkus main
body:
### Describe the bug

Native binary run log is not visible when running tests with Quarkus main.

I can see this warning in log -`[WARNING] Corrupted channel by directly writing to native stream in forked JVM 1. See FAQ web page and the dump file /Users/rsvoboda/Downloads/code-with-quarkus/target/failsafe-reports/2023-05-09T17-02-55_091-jvmRun1.dumpstream`

Quarkus 3.0.2.Final shows the output correctly for native binary.

999-SNAPSHOT
```
[INFO] Running org.acme.GreetingResourceIT
Executing "/Users/rsvoboda/Downloads/code-with-quarkus/target/code-with-quarkus-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT-runner -Dquarkus.http.port=8081 -Dquarkus.http.ssl-port=8444 -Dtest.url=http://localhost:8081 -Dquarkus.log.file.path=/Users/rsvoboda/Downloads/code-with-quarkus/target/quarkus.log -Dquarkus.log.file.enable=true -Dquarkus.log.category."io.quarkus".level=INFO -Dquarkus.platform.version=999-SNAPSHOT -Dquarkus.platform.group-id=io.quarkus"
[INFO] Tests run: 1, Failures: 0, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0, Time elapsed: 3.857 s - in org.acme.GreetingResourceIT
[INFO]
[INFO] Results:
[INFO]
[INFO] Tests run: 1, Failures: 0, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0
[INFO]
[WARNING] Corrupted channel by directly writing to native stream in forked JVM 1. See FAQ web page and the dump file /Users/rsvoboda/Downloads/code-with-quarkus/target/failsafe-reports/2023-05-09T17-02-55_091-jvmRun1.dumpstream
```

3.0.2.Final
```
[INFO] Running org.acme.GreetingResourceIT
Executing "/Users/rsvoboda/Downloads/code-with-quarkus/target/code-with-quarkus-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT-runner -Dquarkus.http.port=8081 -Dquarkus.http.ssl-port=8444 -Dtest.url=http://localhost:8081 -Dquarkus.log.file.path=/Users/rsvoboda/Downloads/code-with-quarkus/target/quarkus.log -Dquarkus.log.file.enable=true -Dquarkus.log.category."io.quarkus".level=INFO"
__  ____  __  _____   ___  __ ____  ______
 --/ __ \/ / / / _ | / _ \/ //_/ / / / __/
 -/ /_/ / /_/ / __ |/ , _/ ,< / /_/ /\ \
--\___\_\____/_/ |_/_/|_/_/|_|\____/___/
2023-05-09 16:58:56,819 INFO  [io.quarkus] (main) code-with-quarkus 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT native (powered by Quarkus 3.0.2.Final) started in 0.025s. Listening on: http://0.0.0.0:8081
2023-05-09 16:58:56,820 INFO  [io.quarkus] (main) Profile prod activated.
2023-05-09 16:58:56,820 INFO  [io.quarkus] (main) Installed features: [cdi, resteasy-reactive, smallrye-context-propagation, vertx]
[INFO] Tests run: 1, Failures: 0, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0, Time elapsed: 3.1 s - in org.acme.GreetingResourceIT
[INFO]
[INFO] Results:
[INFO]
[INFO] Tests run: 1, Failures: 0, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0
```

### Expected behavior

Quarkus main shows the output correctly for native binary.

### Actual behavior

Quarkus main doesn't shows the output correctly for native binary. 

this warning is in console: `[WARNING] Corrupted channel by directly writing to native stream in forked JVM 1. See FAQ web page and the dump file /Users/rsvoboda/Downloads/code-with-quarkus/target/failsafe-reports/2023-05-09T17-02-55_091-jvmRun1.dumpstream`

### How to Reproduce?

Get sample app from https://code.quarkus.io/

Run `mvn clean verify -Dnative -Dquarkus.platform.group-id=io.quarkus -Dquarkus.platform.version=999-SNAPSHOT` 

Or just `mvn clean verify` to see Quarkus 3.0.2.Final (correct) behavior.

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

macOS

### Output of `java -version`

Java 17

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

22.3

### Quarkus version or git rev

Quarkus main

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
